title: Innovation (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Fees)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Fees) 

(No. 2) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 8 December 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited company act 2014 (fees) (no 2) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 8 december 2021

title: Innovation (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Act of 2014” means the Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014); 

“Council Regulation” means Council Regulation (EC) No. 2157/2001 of 8 
October 2001 on the Statute for a European company (SE); 

“electronic form” means in relation to the doing of any act specified in the 
second column to the table of fees set out in the Schedule the doing of that act 
by means of the electronic filing system in use by the Registrar of Companies; 

“paper form” means, in relation to a matter specified in the second column to 
the table of fees set out in the Schedule— 

(a) 

(b) 

the filing of a document or an application in paper form, or 

the inspection of a document or an application submitted in 
paper form, or 

(c) 

the submission of a document in paper form; 

“Regulations of 2007” means the European Communities (European Public 
Limited Liability Company) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 21 of 2007); 

“Societas Europaea” shall be construed in accordance with the Regulations of
text_norm: 2 regulations-- act 2014 mean company act 2014 (no 38 2014) council regulation mean council regulation (ec) no 2157 2001 8 october 2001 statute european company (se) electronic form mean relation act specified second column table fee set schedule act mean electronic filing system use registrar company paper form mean relation matter specified second column table fee set schedule-- (a) (b) filing document application paper form inspection document application submitted paper form (c) submission document paper form regulation 2007 mean european community (european public limited liability company) regulation 2007 (s.i no 21 2007) societas europaea shall construed accordance regulation

title: Innovation (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020
Innovation (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020
heading: 3. The fees to be paid to the Registrar are those set out in the third and
text_raw:
3. The fees to be paid to the Registrar are those set out in the third and 
fourth columns of the Schedule to these Regulations opposite the mention of 
the matter specified in the second column of the Schedule.
text_norm: 3 fee paid registrar set third fourth column schedule regulation opposite mention matter specified second column schedule

title: Innovation (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020
heading: 4. Where the Registrar directs pursuant to section 30(3)(b) of the Act of
text_raw:
4. Where the Registrar directs pursuant to section 30(3)(b) of the Act of 
2014 that a company change its name, any fee that would, but for this 
Regulation, be required to be paid in respect of the registration of that change 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [674] 3 

shall not be charged, levied or paid.

title: Innovation (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020
heading: 5. (1) On or after 1 March 2022, the Schedule to these Regulations is
text_raw:
5. (1) On or after 1 March 2022, the Schedule to these Regulations is 

amended — 

(a) 

in reference number 16 by substituting: 

(i) in column (3), “Not applicable” for “€15”, and 

(ii) in column (4), “€15” for “Nil”, 

(b) 

(c) 

in column (3) of reference numbers 26 to 29 and 37 to 46 by 
substituting “Not applicable” for “€15”, and 

in column (3) of reference number 48 by substituting “Not 
applicable” for “€300”.
text_norm: 5 (1) 1 march 2022 schedule regulation amended -- (a) reference number 16 substituting (i) column (3) applicable eur15 (ii) column (4) eur15 nil (b) (c) column (3) reference number 26 29 37 46 substituting applicable eur15 column (3) reference number 48 substituting applicable eur300

text_raw:

2021) are revoked.

title: Innovation (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020
heading: (This Note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This Note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations set out the fees to be paid to the Registrar of Companies in 
respect of matters under the Companies Act 2014 and revoke the Companies Act 
2014 (Fees) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 395 of 2021).
